name: .AXD File Extension
summary: Learn about .AXD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An AXD file is a file used by ASP.NET applications for handling embedded resource requests. It contains instructions for retrieving embedded resources, such as images, JavaScript (.JS) files, and .CSS files. AXD files are used for injecting resources into the client-side webpage and access them on the server in a standard way.

content: AXD files typically have the name WebResource.axd and have the object type "AssemblyResourceLoader" within ASP.NET program code. WebResource.axd functionality can be enabled in the AssemblyInfo.cs file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
